text: (bright upbeat music)
- Hi, I'm Tufan.

I'm a senior solutions
architect based in Berlin,
and I'm working with Media Enterprises.
As a solutions architect,

we are helping customers to
realize their business goals
with excellent technical architecture.

The solutions architects
at AWS are very special
compared to most other industries.

We are responsible not only
to provide the customer's
technical solutions,

but we also work with
business stakeholders.
So we talk business and technology,
and this makes the solutions architects
unique in the market.
(bright upbeat music continues)
We are working directly with customers,
and while we are impacting their successes
and their businesses,

I think we do a lot to
help also the communities.
Also, in terms of sustainability,

one of our goal's to help
the customers be sustainable

and guide them to more
sustainable architectures.

The good thing at AWS
is you own your calendar
and you own your own diaries.
So I have the possibility and independence
to organize my day based on my needs
and based on my personal choices.
AWS is a great place to work with,
and if you're interested to work with AWS,
then I promise you,
you will be working with great colleagues.
You will be working in a great environment
to grow and to be successful
and also to have fun.
(bright upbeat music continues)
